title: Build and test a documentation update
contents:
mode_edit

建構和測試文件更新link

Build and test a documentation updatelink

完成文件更新後，你希望在本地計算機上執行文件的端到端測試。這些測試是你開啟 Pull Request 後執行的一些測試。當你在本地計算機上執行端到端測試失敗時，可以比開啟 Pull Request 後更快地發現它們。

After you have completed your documentation update, you want to run the documentation's end-to-end tests on your local computer. These tests are some of the tests that are run after you open a pull request. You can find end-to-end test failures faster when you run them on your local computer than after you open a pull request.

在本地計算機上建構文件link

Build the documentation on your local computerlink

在測試更新的文件之前，你要建構它以確保測試了最新的更改。

Before you test your updated documentation, you want to build it to make sure you test your latest changes.

在本地計算機上建構文件link

To build the documentation on your local computerlink

從本地計算機上的命令列工具或 IDE 的終端窗格中執行這些步驟。

Perform these steps from a command-line tool on your local computer or in the terminal pane of your IDE.

  1. 導航到你的工作目錄。

    Navigate to your working directory.

  2. 從你的工作目錄，執行此命令以導航到 aio 目錄。aio 目錄包含 Angular 的文件檔案和工具。

    From your working directory, run this command to navigate to the aio directory. The aio directory contains Angular's documentation files and tools.

    cd aio

  3. 執行此命令以在本地建構文件。

    Run this command to build the documentation locally.

    yarn build

    這會從頭開始建構文件。

    This builds the documentation from scratch.

在本地計算機上建構文件後，你可以執行 angular.io 端到端測試。

After you build the documentation on your local computer, you can run the angular.io end-to-end test.

在本地計算機上執行 angular.io 端到端測試link

Run the angular.io end-to-end test on your local computerlink

此過程會執行你開啟 Pull Request 後執行的大多數（但不是全部）測試。

This procedure runs most, but not all, of the tests that are run after you open a pull request.

在本地計算機上執行 angular.io 端到端測試link

To run the angular.io end-to-end test on your local computerlink

在本地計算機上的命令列工具或 IDE 的“終端”窗格中：

On your local computer, in a command line tool or the Terminal pane of your IDE:

  1. 從你的工作區目錄執行此命令以導航到你的工作目錄。

    Run this command from your workspace directory to navigate to your working directory.

    cd personal/angular

  2. 將 working-branch 替換為你的 working 分支的名稱，並執行此命令以簽出你的 working 分支。

    Replace working-branch with the name of your working branch and run this command to check out your working branch.

    git checkout working-branch

  3. 執行此命令以導航到文件。

    Run this command to navigate to the documentation.

    cd aio

  4. 執行這些命令以執行端到端測試。

    Run these commands to run the end-to-end tests.

    yarn e2e yarn docs-test

  5. 監視測試可能報告的錯誤。

    Watch for errors that the test might report.

沒有報告錯誤link

No errors reportedlink

如果端到端測試沒有報告錯誤，並且你的更新已透過所有其他所需的審查，則你的文件更新已準備好接受 Pull Request。

If the end-to-end tests report no errors and your update has passed all other reviews required, your documentation update is ready for a pull request.

開啟 Pull Request 後，GitHub 會測試你的 Pull 請求中的程式碼。GitHub 執行的測試包括你剛剛執行的端到端測試以及僅在 GitHub 儲存庫中執行的其他測試。因此，即使你的更新在本地通過了端到端測試，但你的更新在你開啟 Pull Request 後仍然可能會報告錯誤。

After you open your pull request, GitHub tests the code in your pull request. The tests that GitHub runs include the end-to-end tests that you just ran and other tests that only run in the GitHub repo. Because of that, even though your update passed the end-to-end tests locally, your update could still report an error after you open a pull request.

報告的錯誤link

Errors reportedlink

如果端到端測試在你的本地計算機上報告錯誤，請確保在開啟 Pull Request 之前更正它。如果更新在本地未能透過端到端測試，則很可能會導致你開啟 Pull Request 後執行的測試失敗。

If the end-to-end tests report an error on your local computer, be sure to correct it before you open a pull request. If the update fails the end-to-end test locally, it is likely to also fail the tests that run after you open a pull request.

最後複查時間：10/12/2022
